title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Success Factor Analysis and Statistical Prediction Modeling for Pharmacy Education Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can construct multiple regression models for success factors in pharmacy education programs
Learners can apply weighted average-based academic achievement calculation methods in simulation environments
Participants can interpret step-wise/forced regression analysis results to propose improvements for pharmacy education curricula
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
